oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-04-26 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 26, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Bill Monroe, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 968th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price; Rod Brasfield; Bill Monroe; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ray Price -- It's All Your Fault (Ray Price) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Bill Monroe -- Molly And Tenbrooks (Bill Monroe) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Tommy Jackson -- Katy Hill (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ray Price talks -- Farther Along (Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Chet Atkins -- Armen's Theme (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996
